name: Fundnhub Business Solutions
overview:
Fundnhub! is a venture fund that focuses on funding startups, Growing Businesses and Improving Lives.

It provides through Gateways, entry points for startups to secure funding, partners, acquire start-up management competence, and provides online apps for innovators and needers to auto-develop their business plans online.

Through the Fundnhub SpringBoard it selects companies to finance and consult with all year round.

The Feezibu Gateway allows enterprenuers to see the financial result of their assumptions and business model instantly by producing an instant business plan online.

The Fundnhub Start-up Academy is a start-up Skill Development Academy and develops start-up promoters and investors competences in the Organizational MOLE: Start-up Management, Leadership, Entrepreneurship and Organisational Development.

Fundnhub Funding Fair is a network for the connection of investors and innovators in its Double-i Connection Hub; and allows a meeting point for Donors, Supporters, Funders, Needers and Investors to meet.

Recently, launched in September 21, 2012, Fundnhub provides business solutions for startup and businesses of all sizes.

offices.address1: 215 Ademola Adetokunbo Crescent, Valley Mall, Dup 2
